00036 /* Fixed-point arithmetic macros.
00037  *
00038  * Author: David Huggins-Daines <dhuggins@cs.cmu.edu>
00039  */
00040 
00041 #ifndef _FIXPOINT_H_
00042 #define _FIXPOINT_H_
00043 
00044 /* Win32/WinCE DLL gunk */
00045 #include <sphinxbase_export.h>
00046 #include <prim_type.h>
00047 #include <limits.h>
00048 
00049 
00050 #ifdef __cplusplus
00051 extern "C" {
00052 #endif
00053 #if 0
00054 /* Fool Emacs. */
00055 }
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 #ifndef DEFAULT_RADIX
00059 #define DEFAULT_RADIX 12
00060 #endif
00061 
00063 typedef int32 fixed32;
00064 
00066 #define FLOAT2FIX_ANY(x,radix) \
00067         (((x)<0.0) ? \
00068         ((fixed32)((x)*(float32)(1<<(radix)) - 0.5)) \
00069         : ((fixed32)((x)*(float32)(1<<(radix)) + 0.5)))
00070 #define FLOAT2FIX(x) FLOAT2FIX_ANY(x,DEFAULT_RADIX)
00071 
00072 #define FIX2FLOAT_ANY(x,radix) ((float32)(x)/(1<<(radix)))
00073 #define FIX2FLOAT(x) FIX2FLOAT_ANY(x,DEFAULT_RADIX)
00074 
00083 /* Actually this is StrongARM-specific and not armv6-compatible.  
00084  * Skip out iPhone targets by skipping __APPLE__ builds. 
00085  */
00086 #if defined(__arm__) && !defined(__APPLE__)
00087 #define FIXMUL(a,b) FIXMUL_ANY(a,b,DEFAULT_RADIX)
00088 #define FIXMUL_ANY(a,b,r) ({                            \
00089       int cl, ch, _a = a, _b = b;                       \
00090       __asm__ ("smull %0, %1, %2, %3\n"                 \
00091            "mov %0, %0, lsr %4\n"                       \
00092            "orr %0, %0, %1, lsl %5\n"                   \
00093            : "=&r" (cl), "=&r" (ch)                     \
00094            : "r" (_a), "r" (_b), "i" (r), "i" (32-(r)));\
00095       cl; })
00096 #elif defined(BFIN) && DEFAULT_RADIX == 16
00097 /* Blackfin magic */
00098 #undef FIXMUL
00099 /* Use the accumulators for the 16.16 case (probably not as efficient as it could be). */
00100 #define FIXMUL(a,b) ({                                  \
00101       int c, _a = a, _b = b;                            \
00102         __asm__("%0.L = %1.l * %2.l (FU);\n\t"          \
00103             "%0.H = %1.h * %2.h (IS);\n\t"              \
00104             "A1 = %0;\n\t"                              \
00105             "A1 += %1.h * %2.l (IS, M);\n\t"            \
00106             "%0 = (A1 += %2.h * %1.l) (IS, M);\n\t"     \
00107             : "=&W" (c)                                 \
00108             : "d" (_a), "d" (_b)                        \
00109             : "A1", "cc");                                      \
00110       c; })
00111 #define FIXMUL_ANY(a,b,radix) ((fixed32)(((int64)(a)*(b))>>(radix)))
00112 #elif defined(_MSC_VER) || (defined(HAVE_LONG_LONG) && SIZEOF_LONG_LONG == 8)
00113 #define FIXMUL(a,b) FIXMUL_ANY(a,b,DEFAULT_RADIX)
00114 #define FIXMUL_ANY(a,b,radix) ((fixed32)(((int64)(a)*(b))>>(radix)))
00115 #else /* Most general case where 'long long' doesn't exist or is slow. */
00116 #define FIXMUL(a,b) FIXMUL_ANY(a,b,DEFAULT_RADIX)
00117 #define FIXMUL_ANY(a,b,radix) \
00118         (fixed32)(((((uint32)(a))&((1<<(radix))-1))         \
00119                    * (((uint32)(b))&((1<<(radix))-1)) >> (radix))       \
00120         + (((((int32)(a))>>(radix)) * (((int32)(b))>>(radix))) << (radix)) \
00121         + ((((uint32)(a))&((1<<(radix))-1)) * (((int32)(b))>>(radix))) \
00122         + ((((uint32)(b))&((1<<(radix))-1)) * (((int32)(a))>>(radix))))
00123 #endif
00124 
00125 /* Various fixed-point logarithmic functions that we need. */
00127 #define MIN_FIXLOG -2829416  /* log(1e-300) * (1<<DEFAULT_RADIX) */
00128 #define MIN_FIXLOG2 -4081985 /* log2(1e-300) * (1<<DEFAULT_RADIX) */
00129 
00130 #define FIXLN_2         ((fixed32)(0.693147180559945 * (1<<DEFAULT_RADIX)))
00131 
00132 #define FIXLN(x) (fixlog(x) - (FIXLN_2 * DEFAULT_RADIX))
00133 
00137 int32 fixlog(uint32 x);
00142 int32 fixlog2(uint32 x);
00143 
00144 #ifdef __cplusplus
00145 }
00146 #endif
00147 
00148 
00149 #endif /* _FIXPOINT_H_ */
